channel.title: NPC Dialogs

item.title: NPC Dialogs
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

X-J-K-X:

If you have a file with all your information in, and it’s not ‘Called’ from another file, it’s useless.

I’m sure it is Called, why would it be in the source if nobody bothered to implement it into the server. Do you know where it may be called from?

Its been called from a file called Dialoguehandler.java:


	DialogueHandler() {
		for (int i = 0; i < maxDialogues; i++) {
			DialogueType[i] = -1;
			DialogueNextDia[i] = -1;
                        DialogueInt[i] = -1;
			DialogueNextOption[i][0] = 0;
			DialogueNextOption[i][1] = 0;
			DialogueNextOption[i][2] = 0;
			DialogueNextOption[i][3] = 0;
			DialogueSword[i][0] = -1;
			DialogueSword[i][1] = -1;
			DialogueSword[i][2] = -1;
			DialogueText[i][0] = "";
			DialogueText[i][1] = "";
			DialogueText[i][2] = "";
			DialogueText[i][3] = "";
			DialogueQuestion[i] = "";
		}
		loadDialogues("dialogues.cfg");

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Dialogs
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Syrillia, post:2, topic:166162”]Try:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) { if (misc.random2(15) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "9008"; } } [/quote]

Dialogue, not text.

[quote=“webbsta, post:1, topic:166162”]Ive added all my dialogs to my dialogues.cfg and iv put this (9008 being the dialog i want to show):

if (NPCID == 944) {
NpcDialogue = 9008;
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}

This code is placed under case 155: //first click npc

but when i click talk on the npc it does nothing, can anybody help me with this, i think iv missed something in the code iv put under case 155. thanks.[/quote]

Is dialogue.cfg called?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Dialogs
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Try:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {
						if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "9008";
}
}
